text: Hi all - The landing page template I'm using is supposed to be responsive and everything should resize according to browser size, but it's not resizing at all when I view it on mobile. Would anyone be able to shed some light on this?

If I would like to have a subscription preferences page that only includes some of the subscription types (e.g. in a certain language), can I somehow achieve that or are all subscription types always displayed?
Could it maybe be accomplished with the Email Subscriptions API?
The problem with a custom subscription page using APIs is that the user can't undo an opt out like they can on the default subscription page.

Where did you get the template from?
Is there a link you could please share?
May want to cross post this question in <#C2YHAHB6K|api> channel. The API team hangs out in there :slightly_smiling_face:
